summary: Federal agencies rely on IT to carry out operations and fulfill their missions. Each year, the government invests more than $100 billion on IT. But for several decades, federal IT investments have often failed or cost more and taken longer to implement. Because of this, the federal government's IT management has been on our High Risk List since 2015. This report identifies 3 major challenges...
title: High-Risk Series: Critical Actions Needed to Urgently Address IT Acquisition and Management Challenges
